item.description:
Holiday Cocktail Party Photoshoot for November 19th from 9:00 PM to midnight.

Holiday is coming, let's dress up and go party!
Let have a drink with models and take their photo at a bar/night-club setting, and have another drink to celebrate our friendship and the
successful of a growing BPP group
And more drink ...

Please wrap up a 8x10 favorite photo from your collection to bring to the party where we could swap the gift with others. Consider also printing a selected 8x10 for your model(s) as it would surely be appreciated.

Notes:

1) This event are FREE to all models but photographers need to pay $25.00 fee to cover the organizing cost.

2) All models are invited but need to email to register so that I could figure out how many MUA/Hairstylist need to be hired for the event.

Location:

Fairmont Battery Wharf

3 Battery Wharf

Boston, MA

----------------------------------

MUA: Shells R.

Hairstylist: Amanda O.

List of confirmed models:

- Abigael B

- Caitlin E. + 3

- Caitlyn L.

- Colleen C.

- Kay J.

- Kayla K. (Shells' friend)

- Lindsay LF.

- Priya K.

- Yuliya R. + 1

- Ashley C + 2

- Sarah C + 1

- Paola N + Flavia M

- Nivea H + 1

- Rebecca Payne + 1

- Rodica O

- Vicki Rivera

- Trang T & Crystal

- Tara

----------------------------------

PARKING:
The hotel provides valet parking. For other parking choices, please, click on the below link to view nearby parking locations and their prices (please, see the 3rd row for "weekend/nights" rates, starting from $7):

http://boston.centralparking.com/search/Battery+Wharf/Boston/MA+02109/USA

Metered parkings are also available on Cross Street (near North End's Hanover street) and at the end/beginning of Downtown on India st. and all parallel streets. Low-cost parking garage can also be located adjacent to the Haymarket Station (for a discount, ask a clerk of the adjacent 7Eleven store to stamp your ticket).

Or you could take the "T" to Haymarket Station and take a 10 minutes walk to the hotel.
item.name: Holiday Cocktail Party Photoshoot on November 19th from 9:00 PM - Midnight
